Package brickdestroy.model

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
brickdestroy.model.Crack
public class Crack extends Object
A crack class that is responsible to make a crack on the cement brick.

      private boolean inMiddle(int i, int steps, int divisions)
      Checks the crack, whether it is in the middle.

      steps - steps of crack
      divisions - divisions of crack
      Returns:
      in Middle status

    • jumps

      private int jumps(int bound, double probability)
      Checks the random number, whether it is greater than 0.7.
      Parameters:
      bound - depth of crack
      probability - a probability of 0.7
      Returns:
      randomInBounds value or 0
